Items.r: {color=#ff0000}獸骨、凝玉露、仙療丸，各一。{/color}缺一不可，就等少俠去張羅了。
Items.c: 獸骨、凝玉露、仙療丸,各一。缺一不可,就等少俠去張羅了。
Items.mt: Animal bones, condensed jade dew, immortal healing pills, one each. One cannot be missing. I'll waiting for the young warrior to go to Zhang Luo.
